section.title: IAVConfig Struct Reference

para.para: Struct to hold IAV configuration settings.

listitem.para: minFrequency - the minimum frequency for sound generation.
maxFrequency - the maximum frequency for sound generation.
trigger - the type of trigger used for tracking.
trackingAlg - the algorithm used for tracking.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Struct to hold IAV configuration settings.

note.title: Note
note.para: This struct is used in the Config class to define some custom configuration settings based on IAV application needs.

formalpara.title: See also
formalpara.para: minFrequency - the minimum frequency for sound generation.
maxFrequency - the maximum frequency for sound generation.
roiRadius - the radius of the region that is used for tracking. It defines the size of it.

warning.title: Warning
warning.para: trigger [currently unsupported] - the type of trigger used for tracking.

formalpara.title: See also
formalpara.para: trackingAlg - the algorithm used for tracking.

warning.title: Warning
warning.para: skipFramesRatio [currently unsupported] - the ratio of frames to skip during tracking.
